dao.interfaces

Interface DAO<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AddressDAO, CompanyDAO<T>, ContractDAO, CustomerDAO, FlatSuretyDAO, FleetDAO, FunctionDAO, IdentityDAO<T>, InsuranceCompanyDAO, InvoiceDAO, LogEntryDAO, NonFlatSuretyDAO, RoleDAO, SpecialConditionDAO, SuretyDAO<T>, UserDAO, VehicleDAO, VehicleInsuranceDAO, VehicleTypeDAO
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProductionAddressDAO, ProductionCompanyDAO, ProductionContractDAO, ProductionCustomerDAO, ProductionDAO, ProductionFlatSuretyDAO, ProductionFleetDAO, ProductionFunctionDAO, ProductionInsuranceCompanyDAO, ProductionInvoiceDAO, ProductionLogEntryDAO, ProductionNonFlatSuretyDAO, ProductionRoleDAO, ProductionSpecialConditionDAO, ProductionSuretyDAO, ProductionUserDAO, ProductionVehicleDAO, ProductionVehicleInsuranceDAO, ProductionVehicleTypeDAO

    public interface DAO<T>
    DAO interface which all other DAO interfaces should extend Created by sam on 3/7/17.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T create(T t)
      Persists the given Object to the database and initializes not lazy loaded properties
      T get(java.util.UUID id)
      Retrieves an object using its unique id
      java.util.Collection<T> listFiltered(Filter<T>... filters)
      Gets all objects of the DAO using filters
      void remove(java.util.UUID id)
      Removes an object using its unique id
      T update(T t)
      Updates the given Object to the database

    • Method Detail

      • create

        T create(T t)
  throws DataAccessException,
         ConstraintViolationException
        Persists the given Object to the database and initializes not lazy loaded properties
        Parameters:
        t - the object
        Returns:
        the same object but some nonlazy properties might be loaded
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - Thrown when something goes wrong in the database
        ConstraintViolationException - Thrown when some properties violate the existing constraints

      • update

        T update(T t)
  throws DataAccessException,
         ConstraintViolationException
        Updates the given Object to the database
        Parameters:
        t - the object to update
        Returns:
        the same object given to the method
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - Thrown when something goes wrong in the database
        ConstraintViolationException - Thrown when some properties violate the existing constraints

      • get

        T get(java.util.UUID id)
throws DataAccessException,
      ObjectNotFoundException
        Retrieves an object using its unique id
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the object
        Returns:
        the object matching the given UUID
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - Thrown when something goes wrong retrieving the object
        ObjectNotFoundException

     throws DataAccessException,
            ObjectNotFoundException
        Removes an object using its unique id
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the object
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - Thrown when something goes wrong retrieving the object
        ObjectNotFoundException

      • listFiltered

        java.util.Collection<T> listFiltered(Filter<T>... filters)
                              throws DataAccessException
        Gets all objects of the DAO using filters
        Parameters:
        filters - an array of filters to use (can be empty)
        Returns:
        A collection of objects which satisfy the given filters
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - Thrown when the objects cannot be retrieved
